attributes.contentHtml:
I am a staff in CygenNodes from its beginning and just to make it clear we do not have any staff from Ghana. i will tell some more things.

  1. all our paid customers have got what they want and we do not have any complaints
  2. if you think we are scammer then look in the reviews channel or our trustpilot page
  3. tteg is a great guy and this is his first host. he never had any other host and cygen is his first host
  4. and next clearly you are blind as you cannot read the announcements telling that the website was in maintenance
  5. the owner never gives access to any staff member to test the services. you just posted a random ip's screenshot
  6. you are just a staff that got kicked for inactiveness
